Title: Requires the state police to have a local liaison within the New York state intelligence center who alerts municipalities of certain suspected domestic extremism threats
Summary: Requires the state police to have a local liaison within the New York state intelligence center who alerts municipalities of certain suspected domestic extremism threats and receives information from local law enforcement regarding domestic extremism.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring the state police to have a local liaison within the New York state intelligence center who alerts municipalities of certain suspected domestic extremism threats
